articles.title: Publix starts taking appointments for Johnson & Johnson vaccine Wednesday - WFLA
articles.description: The first doses of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine have arrived at Publix pharmacies in Florida, and people can sign up to get the shot starting Wednesday.

articles.title: Convalescent Plasma For COVID-19 Turns Out To Be A Bust : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: Infusing blood plasma from people who have recovered from COVID-19 into sick patients looks good on paper. But studies of the treatment haven't found benefits.
articles.content:
Melissa Cruz elevates her arm after donating COVID-19 convalescent plasma in April 2020 as phlebotomist Jenee Wilson shuts down the collection equipment at Bloodworks Northwest in Seattle.

articles.title: Pasadena cancels COVID-19 vaccine clinic after hundreds of ineligible people make appointments - KABC-TV
articles.description: The city of Pasadena was forced to cancel a vaccination clinic for Thursday after hundreds of ineligible people got their hands on a link that allowed them to register for one of the slots.

articles.title: Can veganism really lower a person's COVID-19 risk? - Medical News Today
articles.description: A plant-based or vegan diet cannot prevent people from developing COVID-19. They may, however, help support the immune system and aid in prevention. Learn more.
